articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Study finds severe COVID increases risk of THIS life threatening heart complication by 16 times within six months - Times of India
articles.description: ​A study published in the European Society of Cardiology, found that people with severe COVID are 16 times more likely to develop ventricular tachycardia within six months.​
articles.content:
The researchers found that those with severe COVID also had a 13-fold risk of atrial fibrillation, 14-fold risk of other tachyarrhythmias, and 9-fold risk of bradycardia/ pacemaker implantation.
Age… [+196 chars]

articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for April 19 - Bloomberg
articles.description: European stocks and US equity futures retreated while bond yields rose as traders assessed the latest corporate earnings reports against the backdrop of yet another hot inflation print from one of the world’s major economies.

articles.title: Sloth steals the show during Jupiter mission launch broadcast - WFLA
articles.description: As viewers turned in to watch the European Space Agency’s (ESA) mission launch to Jupiter Saturday, they were surprised and delighted to see a sloth’s brief onscreen appearance.
